A custom template can be manually applie: A custom template can be manually applied to any post or page.

Saving your changes will change your act: Saving your changes will change your active theme from %1$s to %2$s.
Are you sure you want to apply this revi: Are you sure you want to apply this revision? Any unsaved changes will be lost.
Click on previously saved styles to prev: Click on previously saved styles to preview them. To restore a selected version to the editor, hit "Apply." When you're ready, use the “Save” button to save your changes.
These styles are already applied to your: These styles are already applied to your site.

Uploaded fonts appear in your library an: Uploaded fonts appear in your library and can be used in your theme. Supported formats: .ttf, .otf, .woff, and .woff2.
No fonts found. Try with a different sea: No fonts found. Try with a different search term
Error installing the fonts, could not be: Error installing the fonts, could not be downloaded.
You can alternatively upload files direc: You can alternatively upload files directly on the Upload tab.
To install fonts from Google you must gi: To install fonts from Google you must give permission to connect directly to Google servers. The fonts you install will be downloaded from Google and stored on your site. Your site will then use these locally-hosted fonts.

Choose font variants. Keep in mind that: Choose font variants. Keep in mind that too many variants could make your site slower.

Add your own CSS to customize the appear: Add your own CSS to customise the appearance of the %s block. You do not need to include a CSS selector, just add the property and value.
Customize the appearance of specific blo: Customise the appearance of specific blocks and for the whole site.
Add your own CSS to customize the appear: Add your own CSS to customise the appearance and layout of your site.
Customize the appearance of specific blo: Customise the appearance of specific blocks for the whole site.
Note that the same template can be used: Note that the same template can be used by multiple pages, so any changes made here may affect other pages on the site. To switch back to editing the page content click the ‘Back’ button in the toolbar.
It\u2019s now possible to edit page cont: It’s now possible to edit page content in the site editor. To customise other parts of the page like the header and footer switch to editing the template using the settings sidebar.
Here\u2019s a detailed guide to learn ho: Here’s a detailed guide to learn how to make the most of it.
New to block themes and styling your sit: New to block themes and styling your site?
You can adjust your blocks to ensure a c: You can adjust your blocks to ensure a cohesive experience across your site – add your unique colours to a branded button block, or adjust the heading block to your preferred size.
You can customize your site as much as y: You can customise your site as much as you like with different colours, typography, and layouts. Or if you prefer, just leave it up to your theme to handle!
Tweak your site, or give it a whole new: Tweak your site, or give it a whole new look! Get creative – how about a new colour palette for your buttons, or choosing a new font? Take a look at what you can do here.
Click <StylesIconImage \/> to start desi: Click <StylesIconImage /> to start designing your blocks, and choose your typography, layout, and colours.
Design everything on your site \u2014 fr: Design everything on your site – from the header right down to the footer – using blocks.
Use left and right arrow keys to resize: Use left and right arrow keys to resize the canvas. Hold shift to resize in larger increments.
View site (opens in a new tab): View site (opens in a new tab)
Apply this block\u2019s typography, spac: Apply this block’s typography, spacing, dimensions, and colour styles to all %s blocks.
